attributes.action: stop rehabilitating criminals as a punishment, punish them first then rehabilitate them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up with lack of real punishments for criminals, we seem to be more intent on rehabilitating them rather than punishing them, I wish a two tier system introduced where prisoners are first sent to punsihment centres and then to rehabilitation centres.
Put the innocents rights before the guilty's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
